trans-unit.source: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: 프로그래밍 방식으로 XML Web services 검색을 호출 하기 위한 지원을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스 검색, 찾기 또는 검색, 하나는 과정은 또는 이상의 관련 제공 되는 XML 웹 서비스를 설명 하는 문서입니다.

trans-unit.source: It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them.
trans-unit.target: 통해 지정 된 URL을 사용 하는 방법에서 사용 가능한 XML 웹 서비스에 대 한 XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트 자세히 배울 XML Web services 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 XML Web services discovery의 작동 가능 http://uddi.microsoft.com, 같은 디렉터리 서비스를 통해 검색 문서에 대 한 URL을 이미 얻은 없는 XML 웹 서비스에 대 한 세부 정보 있다고 프레미스에서 제공 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> at a specific URL.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 검색을 통해에 나열 된 XML 웹 서비스에 대 한 세부 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>특정 URL에.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트 중 하나에 대 한 URL을 제공 하 여 XML Web services 검색을 시작는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 URL에 추가 되는 하나 이상의 XML 웹 서비스를 설명 하는 문서를 참조 하는 검색 문서를 참조 되는 일반적으로 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: 이 시점에서 해당 문서에만 다운로드 이며 XML 웹 서비스에 대 한 올바른 정보를 가리키도록 확인 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 해당 문서에 포함 된 참조는이 단계에서 확인 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead they are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 대신에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify that the references are valid, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, which add valid referenced documents to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 참조가 유효한 지를 확인 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>유효한 참조 된 문서를 추가 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Last, 클라이언트가 호출는 디스크에 검색 결과 저장 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 검색에 대 한 프로그래밍 방식의 액세스 필요 하지 않은 경우는 [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] 명령 프롬프트 내에서 XML 웹 서비스를 검색 하기 위한 웹 서비스 검색 도구 (Disco.exe)를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [웹 서비스 검색 도구 (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서에서 찾은 참조와 함께 정보를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The AdditionalInformation property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding> class, defined in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: AdditionalInformation 속성으로 표시 되는 SOAP 바인딩을 주로 포함는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding>검색 문서에 정의 된 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> containing additional information found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>검색 문서에 있는 추가 정보가 포함 된.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서 인지 확인 하려면 제공된 된 URL을 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Discover method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Discover 메서드는 제공 된 URL이 검색 문서 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: URL 서비스 설명 또는 XML 스키마를 참조 하는 경우 예외가 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: XML 스키마 또는 서비스 설명 호출을 검색 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 URL 유효한 검색 문서를 가리키는 제공된 된 URL에 있는 검색 문서에 추가 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 또한 검색 문서 내에서 참조에 추가 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>컬렉션 했지만 유효한 검색 문서를 확인 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 유효한 검색 문서를 참조 확인은 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 검색을 시작 하는 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> 제공된 된 URL에서 XML Web services 검색 실행 결과가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> 이외의 HTTP 상태 코드를 반환 제공 된 URL에 액세스

trans-unit.source: The url parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.
trans-unit.target: url 변수가 올바른 URL을 참조 하지 않는 유효한 검색 문서를 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서, 서비스 설명 또는 XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 인지 확인 하려면 제공된 된 URL을 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DiscoverAny method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: DiscoverAny 메서드는 제공된 된 URL 인지 검색 문서, 서비스 설명 또는 XSD 스키마를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method might be invoked.
trans-unit.target: URL만 검색 문서에 참조를 알 경우는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>메서드를 호출 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 제공 된 URL이 유효한 검색 문서, XSD 스키마 또는 서비스 설명 가리키는, 제공된 된 URL에 있는 검색 문서에 추가 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> is created in memory and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 제공 된 URL XSD 스키마 또는 서비스 설명서를 참조 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>메모리에 만들어지고에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 또한 검색 문서 내에서 참조에 추가 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>컬렉션 했지만 유효한 검색 문서를 확인 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 참조가 유효한 검색 문서를 가리키는지 확인, 호출 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 검색을 시작 하는 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> 제공된 된 URL에서 XML Web services 검색 실행 결과가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the url parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a is created in memory for it.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 url 매개 변수는 서비스 설명 또는 XSD 스키마에서 참조 한 의 메모리에 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> 이외의 HTTP 상태 코드를 반환 제공 된 URL에 액세스

trans-unit.source: The url parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: url 변수가 올바른 URL을 참조 하지 않는 유효한 검색 문서, 서비스 설명 또는 XSD 스키마를 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Documents collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안 문서 컬렉션이 채워집니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the Documents collection.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>메서드를 제공된 된 URL이 유효한 검색 문서, 문서 Documents 컬렉션에 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, valid discovery document references in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection are added to the Documents collection.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>메서드 유효한 검색 문서에서 참조 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>컬렉션 문서 컬렉션에 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> representing the collection of discovery documents found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"> </xref> 찾은 검색 문서의 컬렉션을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 URL에 있는 검색 문서를 다운로드 한 <xref:System.IO.Stream>개체입니다.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서를 다운로드의 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>제공된 된 URL에 문서가 포함 된.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 URL에서 다운로드 <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> 이외의 HTTP 상태 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a object, setting the contentType parameter to the MIME encoding of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 URL에 있는 검색 문서를 다운로드 한 설정 개체는 contentType 매개 변수를 검색 하는 문서의 MIME 인코딩.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서를 다운로드의 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: The MIME encoding of the downloaded discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 다운로드 한 검색 문서의 MIME 인코딩입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>제공된 된 URL에 문서가 포함 된.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 URL에서 다운로드 <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> 이외의 HTTP 상태 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of exceptions that occurred during invocation of method from this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 메서드를 호출 하는 동안 발생 한 예외 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Errors collection is populated with exceptions that occurred during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Errors 컬렉션 호출 하는 동안 발생 한 예외를 채워집니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary> is cleared on invocation of these methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>이러한 메서드의 호출에서 선택 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary"></xref> of exceptions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary"> </xref> 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> object to load any external references.
trans-unit.target: 지시는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> 외부 참조를 로드 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*> properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.
trans-unit.target: 저장 된 검색 문서 채우기의 지도 포함 하는 파일을 읽는 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 검색 문서, XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 및 파일에서 참조 하는 서비스 설명의 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: 파일의 저장 된 검색 문서 맵을 포함 하 여 만들 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>메서드나 Disco.exe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: `topLevelFilename` 파일이 현재 디렉터리에 없는 경우 매개 변수는 정규화 된 경로 포함 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 이름 검색 문서 저장의 맵이 포함 된 파일을 읽을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"> </xref> 의 맵 사용 하 여 파일에 결과가 포함 된 검색 문서를 저장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The file format is a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: 파일 형식은 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>클래스를 XML로 serialize; 하지만 하나는 일반적으로 파일을 만들만 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*>메서드나 Disco.exe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>

trans-unit.source: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 확인 된 검색 문서에서 찾은 되는 참조의 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The References collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안 참조 컬렉션이 채워집니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the References collection together with references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>메서드를 제공된 된 URL이 유효한 검색 문서, 문서 검색 문서에 있는 참조 함께 참조 컬렉션에 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: References added during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안 추가 된 참조는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>메서드는 반드시 유효한 검색 문서 아닙니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> references within the References collection are verified as being valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 동안 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>References 컬렉션 내에서 참조 되는 유효한 검색 문서 확인 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the References collection.
trans-unit.target: 유효 하며 참조를 포함 하는 경우 또한 References 컬렉션에 추가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection"></xref> of references discovered.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection"> </xref> 검색 된 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*> property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서, XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 및의 서비스 설명에 대 한 모든 참조가 확인 되는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>속성 뿐만 아니라 참조 검색 문서에 대 한 참조.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>

trans-unit.source: ResolveAll resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll 찾아에 배치 하는 모든 유효한 참조를 확인할는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ResolveAll and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 두 ResolveAll 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>다운로드 하 고 XSD 스키마를 확인 하 고, 서비스에 대 한 설명을 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 두 방법 검색 문서를 처리 하는 방식에서 서로 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>내에서 검색 문서에서 모든 참조를 확인는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>속성, 검색 문서 기타 검색 문서에 대 한 참조를 포함 하는 경우 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>검색 문서만 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A></xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; whereas ResolveAll resolves them all.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 검색 문서에서 찾은 검색 문서 중첩 수준 해결 되지 않는 하나 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>ResolveAll 모두 확인 하는 반면;.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: ResolveAll continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll 계속 참조가 더 이상 없을 때까지 중첩 된 검색 문서에 대 한 참조를 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by ResolveAll are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll 수행 하는 확인 프로세스 중 발생 하는 오류 하지 잘못 발생 했습니다. 시간에 발생 하지만 대신 수집 되어에 추가 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>, as well as references found in those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서, XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 및 서비스 설명에 대 한 모든 참조를 확인할 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>, 해당 검색 문서에서 찾은 참조 뿐만 아니라.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>

trans-unit.source: ResolveOneLevel resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveOneLevel 찾아에 배치 하는 모든 유효한 참조를 확인할는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and ResolveOneLevel download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>및 다운로드 하 고 XSD 스키마를 확인 하 고, 서비스에 대 한 설명을 ResolveOneLevel는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 두 방법 검색 문서를 처리 하는 방식에서 서로 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: ResolveOneLevel resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 검색 문서에서 모든 참조를 확인 하는 ResolveOneLevel는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, ResolveOneLevel resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 다른 검색 문서에 대 한 참조를 포함 하는 경우 ResolveOneLevel 검색 문서만 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ResolveOneLevel; whereas <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolve them all.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 검색 문서에서 찾은 검색 문서 중첩 수준 ResolveOneLevel; 해결 되지 않는 하나 반면 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>모두 해결 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>참조를 확인 중첩 된 검색 문서에서 참조가 더 이상 없을 때까지 계속 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by ResolveOneLevel are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveOneLevel 수행 하는 확인 프로세스 중 발생 하는 오류 하지 잘못 발생 했습니다. 시간에 발생 하지만 대신 수집 되어에 추가 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.
trans-unit.target: 모든 검색 문서, XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 및 서비스 설명에서 기록는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>속성을 제공 된 디렉터리와 해당 디렉터리에 파일을 만듭니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>

trans-unit.source: The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 이름으로 만든 파일은 `topLevelFilename` 디렉터리 매개 변수로 지정 된 디렉터리에서 매개 변수에 저장 된 검색 문서, XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 및 서비스 설명의 지도 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This file can be read in using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> method to populate the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 파일을 사용 하 여 읽을 수는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A>를 채우는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class.
trans-unit.target: 파일의 형식은 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>클래스</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> 의 한 직렬화 된 버전이 포함 된 XML

trans-unit.source: If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the WriteAll method.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 이름의 파일이 있는 경우는 `topLevelFilename` 에서 매개 변수는 `directory` WriteAll 메서드 매개 변수를 해당 파일을 덮어씁니다.

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: `topLevelFilename` 파일이 현재 디렉터리에 없는 경우 매개 변수는 정규화 된 경로 포함 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> property.
trans-unit.target: 현재 모든 문서를 저장 하는 디렉터리는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.
trans-unit.target: 만들거나 덮어쓸 저장 된 모든 문서의 맵을 포함 하는 파일의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results of all files saved.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"> </xref> 저장 된 모든 파일의 결과 포함 하 합니다.
